name: AncientRomeDemo by Niyazi Berkay
description:
This is a little learning demo made by Niyazi Berkay Çokuysal

This demo includes; Mini Map, Menu Screen, Ultra Dynamic Sky, Character Animations, Attack Animations, Object Collecting (with sound and UI), FPS Count, Music
